#include<iostream>

using namespace std;
typedef unsigned long long int ull;


int main()
{
	int T;
	cin>>T;
	cin.ignore();
	while(T--)
	{
		int flag=0;
		char a[100001];
		cin>>a;
		ull i=0;
		ull count1=0,count2=0;
		while(a[i]!='\0')
		{
			
			
			if(a[i]=='T')
			count1++;
			else 
			count2++;
		//	cout<<count1<<" "<<count2<<endl;
			if(count2>count1)
			{
				flag=1;
				break;
			}
			i++;
		}
		if(flag==0&&count1==count2)
		cout<<"YES"<<endl;
		else
		cout<<"NO"<<endl;
	}
}
